CustomField.description: How would you rate the helpfulness of the Customer Service Representative who handled your request? [On a scale of 1 to 5 with 1 indicating not at all helpful and 5 indicating very helpful]
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How would you rate the helpfulness of the Customer Service Representative who handled your request? [On a scale of 1 to 5 with 1 indicating not at all helpful and 5 indicating very helpful]
CustomField.label: Helpfulness
